FuncDef: This command defines how long these addresses will be kept aside when standby addresses are signaled to the pool. During this time these addresses can only be used by devices explicitly requesting the IP (for example, datatrigger or DHCP renew/rebind). When the timer expires the addresses will again become available for dynamic allocation.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the standby IP lifetime in days. Values-1 to 3650.
Specifies the standby IP lifetime in hours. Values-1 to 23.
Specifies the standby IP lifetime in minutes. Values-1 to 59.
Specifies the standby IP lifetime in seconds. Values-1 to 59.
Specifies the lifetime of the standby IP addresses. Values-300 to 315446399.
Specifies the lifetime in seconds. Values-300 to 315446399.
